MatchedRegion.transcript: The general sequential episodic memory model, or GSEMM, deals with these two limitations.

MatchedRegion.Text: General Sequential Episodic Memory Model (GSEMM) has a dynamic energy landscape capable of storing and retrieving of temporal memories in its dynamical evolution.

MatchedRegion.transcript: We derive GSEMM by introducing asymmetric synapses with signal propagation delays in the GAMM.

MatchedRegion.Text: The system consists of two layers of neurons organized analogous to General Associative Memory Model (GAMM) with additional delay- based intra-hidden layer connectivity.

MatchedRegion.transcript: The asymmetric synapses result in the temporal behavior of the model and the delay stabilizes individual memories over time.

MatchedRegion.Text: The system consists of two layers of neurons organized analogous to General Associative Memory Model (GAMM) with additional delay- based intra-hidden layer connectivity.
